      public static @Nullable Integer getClassFileMajorVersion(Class<?> clazz)
      Returns:
      the major classfile (bytecode) version of the given class, or null if it cannot be determined

    • getMinimumJavaVersion

      public static @Nullable Integer getMinimumJavaVersion(Class<?> clazz)
      Returns:
      the minimum Java release (e.g. "8", "11", "17") required to run the given class, or null if the class's bytecode version can't be read.

    • getVersion

      public static @Nullable String getVersion(Class<?> clazz)
      Returns:
      the implementation version of the archive containing the class
